programme.title: College Basketball
programme.sub-title: Big East Tournament: DePaul vs. Seton Hall
programme.desc: The No. 7 Pirates take on the No. 10 Blue Demons in the first round of the 2023 Big East Tournament. Seton Hall took both meetings during the regular season, including a 69-64 decision Feb. 5 as part of DePaul's ongoing 12-game losing skid.

programme.title: Big East Tournament Bridge Show
programme.desc: Analysts review and preview games taking place at the Big East basketball tournament.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.sub-title: Big East Tournament: Georgetown vs. Villanova
programme.desc: The No. 6 Wildcats face the No. 11 Hoyas in the first round of the 2023 Big East Tournament. Villanova has won four in a row over Georgetown after sweeping two 2022-23 meetings by a combined 20 points. Nova has taken six of its last eight overall.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.sub-title: Big East Tournament: Butler vs. St. John's
programme.desc: The 2023 Big East Tournament begins with a first-round game between the No. 8 Red Storm and No. 9 Bulldogs. This is the first postseason meeting between the schools, who split two regular-season tilts in 2022-23. Joel Soriano (SJU) totaled 31 points.
